content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I failed in the final exam.
I' m sorry to hear that, failed an exam can be a very stressful experience to have to deal with. Have you taken any steps to address the issue in the past?
I tried hard to cram but it doesn't work.
I completely understand how difficult that can be. Having to cram for something that you don' t feel up to can be stressful, especially if it' s a big exam.
